name: The Miraculous Uncle's Glue
description:
Ladies and Gentlemen, we are here to introduce you the magic “Miraculous Uncle’s Glue!” An incredible new product that comes directly from Italy! It can glue REALLY EVERYTHING! Do you need a proof? Try this game!

The Uncle's Friends:

3D Modelers - Marco Cattaneo, Francesco Loreti , Ruben (Chicken) Piergiovanni

Programmers - Gabriele (El Capitao) Cocino - Leonardo Radicioni - Giulia Sperandeo - Valerio Vitolo

UI Programmers & Level Designers - Leandro Cioni, Lorenzo Peluso

2D Designers - Giorgia Falcinelli

Music - Federico Roscioli

SFX - David Quintarelli
